vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
Delta.tokens_buy.tokens_buy (local variable @ patch_7.sol#19) shadows:
	- Delta.tokens_buy (function @ patch_7.sol#15-31)

vulnerability_findings.message:

Delta.owner2 should be constant (patch_7.sol#6)
